titles: A sermon at Paules Crosse, on behalfe of Paules Church, March 26. 1620. By the B. of London. Both preached and published by his Majesties commandment
author: King, John, 1559?-1621.
publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Elizabeth Adams,
notes: The B. of London = John King.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
